headline: ServiceNow Inc (NOW) Draws Analyst Attention Amid AI Shift
summary: ServiceNow Inc (NYSE:NOW) is one of the best NYSE stocks to buy for the long term. On February 11, ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) announced the appointment of Danielle Fontaine as chief accounting officer and corporate controller, effective February 17. The update was shared in a press release following a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission. […]

headline: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on ServiceNow Stock?
summary: While ServiceNow has notably lagged the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a highly optimistic outlook about the stock’s prospects.

headline: ServiceNow AI Push Tests Workflow Ambitions After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) has agreed to acquire Pyramid Analytics, an AI focused business analytics and data science company. The company also announced a new partnership with consultancy Kearney to help enterprises adopt agentic AI across their workflows. Together, these moves aim to tie advanced analytics, decisioning, and automation more tightly into ServiceNow's platform for large customers. These AI moves land at a time when ServiceNow's share price is $107.08, with the stock down 15.9%...
